Package assignment6.chatRoomApp

package assignment6.chatRoomApp
  • Class
    Description
    ArgumentValidator
    represent the class argument validate which helps validate the ip address and port.
    ChatClient
    The ChatClient class represents a client in the chatroom application.
    ChatClientApp
    Represents the chat room client that helps run the chatroom
    ChatRoomProtocol
    The interface is designed to represent the chat room protocol providing the read and write functions for client and server to process the message frame data.
    ChatServer
    Represents the server class in chat room application
    ChatServerApp
    Represents the chat room application which helps to set up chat room
    ClientHandler
    Represent the client handler class which helps to communicate with a client once server establishes connection
    ClientMessageHandler
    Represents the client message handler class which helps to read the message from server side and print it to console
    MessageFormat
    Represents the message format class which helps to represent the server-client communication in a meaningful way
    ProtocolHandler
    The ProtocolHandler class represents the frame data handler and is implemented form the ChatRoomProtocol interface
    ServerHandler
    Represents a runnable handler to process the message sent from server
    ServerMessageHandler
    Represents the message handler in server side containing the protocol handler and the map of current active clients.
    UiHandler
    Represents a runnable handler to process the input command from client app
    UiInputHandler
    class that represents the input message handler in client side.
